name: incinerate
caption: Incinerate

effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  If the target is [holding]{mechanic:held-item} a [berry]{mechanic:berry}, it's destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.

flavorText:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
